snippet: The billionaire financier George Soros praised Bill de Blasio’s stance on stop-and-frisk in a written endorsement.
abstract: Trailside blog; Billionaire financier and liberal icon George Soros endorses public advocate Bill de Blasio as next mayor of New York; praises him for expanded prekindergarten classes, after-school programs and campaign finance reform.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire financier George Soros praised Bill de Blasio’s stance on stop-and-frisk in a written endorsement.

headline.main: Soros Endorses de Blasio for Mayor
headline.print_headline:
Soros Endorses
De Blasio for Mayor
